name: B. Good Sequences
statement:
Squirrel Liss is interested in sequences. She also has preferences of
integers. She thinks integers are .Now she is interested in good
sequences. A sequence is called if it satisfies the following three
conditions: The sequence is strictly increasing, i.e. for each . No two
adjacent elements are coprime, i.e. for each (where denotes the greatest
common divisor of the integers and ). All elements of the sequence are
good integers. Find the length of the longest good sequence.
